GSD.product_version: versions from v4.15 to before v5.19.6
GSD.description:
rxrpc: Fix locking in rxrpc's sendmsg

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.6 by commit 091dc91e119fdd61432347231724f4e861c6b465, it was introduced in version v4.15 by commit bc5e3a546d553e5223851fc199e69040eb70f68b. For more details please see the references link.
